EngineComponents

Class Physics

  • java.lang.Object
    • EngineComponents.Physics

  • public class Physics
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    2016-01-26

    A physics engine for a game of Pong

      Set the initial values for a game simulation and calls the reset method for the ball object.
      void updateStates()
      Runs the simulation as many times as currently set by a game variable and updates the state of all game objects and variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Physics

        public Physics(int screenWidth,
               int screenHeight,
               int ballSize,
               java.awt.Dimension paddleDimensions,
               int updatesPerRefresh,
               double paddleSpeedFactor,
               java.awt.Point paddle1startPos,
               java.awt.Point paddle2startPos,
               int releaseAngleDelta)
        Class constructor
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - Width of the gamespace in pixels
        screenHeight - Height of the gamespace in pixels
        ballSize - Size of the side of the ball in pixels
        paddleDimensions - A Dimension object with the dimensions of the paddles in pixels
        updatesPerRefresh - Perceived game speed
        paddleSpeedFactor - Paddle's speed as a factor of the ball's.
        paddle1startPos - Initial valu of the top left corner of the player 1's paddle
        paddle2startPos - Initial valu of the top left corner of the player 2's paddle
        releaseAngleDelta - Value of the delta of difference possible between the horizontal and the release angle

      • Physics

        public Physics(int screenWidth,
               int screenHeight,
               int ballSize,
               java.awt.Dimension paddleDimensions,
               int updatesPerRefresh)
        Class constructor
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - Width of the gamespace in pixels
        screenHeight - Height of the gamespace in pixels
        ballSize - Size of the side of the ball in pixels
        paddleDimensions - A Dimension object with the dimensions of the paddles in pixels
        updatesPerRefresh - Represents the perceived game speed

        public void updateStates()
